82ca2dba-3e6d-43e3-8586-04f5a56717cf.description: Transformative leaders are purpose-driven and bring out the best in themselves and others. 82ca2dba-3e6d-43e3-8586-04f5a56717cf.name: EY Transformative Leadership Series (2021)

badge_template_activities.title: In order to receive the Badge you will need to have attended or watched the 4 modules on Transformative Leadership. These include module 1 on Growth Mindset and Purpose, module 2 on Well-being, Resilience and Agility, module 3 on Curiosity and Belonging and module 4 on Teaming and Inspiring. All the modules are available either live through the Transformative Leadership Series, or recorded and accessed through SuccessFactors.

You’ll come away with a clear definition of Transformative Leadership and have a deeper appreciation of the behaviors that drive leadership effectiveness and better business outcomes – crucial for our NextWave success As a result, you’ll also be able to assess your own leadership in the transformative context of Better Me, Better Us, Better Working World

badge_template_activities.title: In order to receive the Badge you will need to have attended or watched the 4 modules on Transformative Leadership. All the modules are available either live through the Transformative Leadership Series, or recorded and accessed through SuccessFactors.

You’ll come away with a clear definition of Transformative Leadership and have a deeper appreciation of the behaviors that drive leadership effectiveness and better business outcomes – crucial for our NextWave success. As a result, you’ll also be able to assess your own leadership in the transformative context of Better Me, Better Us, Better Working World.

422eaac6-eae4-438d-9aa0-637ddfd00054.description: Client Centricity means putting client relationships at the heart of our strategy, operations and processes. To provide clients the best solution we must increasingly work as an ecosystem of alliance relationships. The Client Centricity Series will provide you with insight and practical suggestions to create and deliver long term value for your client communities.
422eaac6-eae4-438d-9aa0-637ddfd00054.name: EY Client Centricity Series (2021)

badge_template_activities.title: Attend or watch the 4 modules on Client Centricity: 1. Module 1 - Relationships in the Virtual World 2. Module 2 - Conversations on the Unknown 3. Module 3 - Co-creating True Insight 4. Module 4 - Service Line Breakouts  These will not be administered through SuccessFactors.

Over four, two-hour modules, learners will explore the following questions:  1. How do I build and strengthen strategic and resilient relationships in a virtual world? 2. What does it mean to be a superconnector? 3. How do I initiate and shape transformational conversations? 4. What does this mean for me in my Service Line?
Please note that the EY organization makes certain disclaimers relating to the award of this badge, the relevant individual's qualifications and/or EY member firm services as set out on EY's website

002ff6f8-87d5-4db0-830e-67d84d6a40ff.description: The purpose of the Disruptive Tech Program (DTP) is to help our partners understand exponential technologies, digital transformation and innovation so that they can confidently have high-quality conversations with C-level clients.

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the full 4-day program: 1) To help you as a senior client partner have better client conversations about disruptive tech and build your tech curiosity. 2) To understand the key technology developments that are impacting business (Scan). 3) To evaluate how companies innovate and respond to disruption (Focus). 4) To learn how we can help clients through this disruption (Act).
Learners will comprehend the content and think like a futurist as it applies to their client's needs in the next 5 years.

6f212244-38a7-410b-902d-c0c370e245f8.description: Transformative leaders are purpose-driven and bring out the best in themselves and others. 6f212244-38a7-410b-902d-c0c370e245f8.name: EY Transformative Leadership Series (2022)

badge_template_activities.title: In order to receive the Badge you will need to have attended or watched the 4 modules on Transformative Leadership. These include module 1 on Growth Mindset and Purpose, module 2 on Well-being, Resilience and Agility, module 3 on Curiosity and Belonging and module 4 on Teaming and Inspiring. All the modules are available either live through the Transformative Leadership Series, or recorded and accessed through SuccessFactors.

You will come away with a clear definition of Transformative Leadership and have a deeper appreciation of the behaviors that drive leadership effectiveness and better business outcomes‚ crucial for our NextWave success. As a result, you'll also be able to assess your own leadership in the transformative context of Better Me, Better Us, Better Working World

ef41fa54-60d4-4da3-b8e2-a5998a91e067.description: Strategic Conversation Series focuses on helping partners be more confident in the C-Suite by better understanding the wider global context and asking powerful strategic questions.
ef41fa54-60d4-4da3-b8e2-a5998a91e067.name: EY Strategic Conversation Series (2022)

badge_template_activities.title: Attend or watch the 3 modules on Strategic Conversation: Module 1 - Geostrategic Outlook for 2021, Module 2 - Strategic Tools and Frameworks, Module 3 - Strategic Decision Making.

Learners will benefit most from this experience if they are willing to honestly assess their own client skills and are willing to reframe their approach and outlook towards their own specific business challenges. This series will be most attractive to partners who seek to understand what frameworks (business, disruption, innovation, strategy) they should be considering and how they can practically apply them to have more strategic conversations with clients.

2ab9b2f2-8262-4cc3-9f1f-2e1b584a037d.description: Transformative leaders are purpose-driven and bring out the best in themselves and others. Focusing on Transformative Leadership, the series was specifically designed to support you during this challenging period of change and uncertainty and build new leadership habits at a time when they are needed more than ever.
2ab9b2f2-8262-4cc3-9f1f-2e1b584a037d.name: EY Transformative Leadership Series (2023)

badge_template_activities.title: In order to receive the Badge you will need to have attended or watched the 4 modules on Transformative Leadership. These include module 1 on Growth Mindset and Purpose, module 2 on Well-being, Resilience and Agility, module 3 on Curiosity and Belonging and module 4 on Teaming and Inspiring. All the modules are available either live through the Transformative Leadership Series, or recorded and accessed through SuccessFactors.

You will come away with a clear definition of Transformative Leadership and have a deeper appreciation of the behaviors that drive leadership effectiveness and better business outcomes‚ crucial for our NextWave success. As a result, you'll also be able to assess your own leadership in the transformative context of Better Me, Better Us, Better Working World
Please note that EY makes certain disclaimers relating to the award of this badge, the relevant individual's qualifications and/or EY member firm services as set out on EY's website.
